content: this overlay mosaic crochet dishcloth/washcloth has a fun zigzag pattern and an envelope border use cotton yarn so it washes your dishes well this pattern comes with written instructions a chart a video and instructions on how to do overlay mosaic crochet sizing 9 x9 easy to adjust sizing by changing your repeats use worsted weight cotton yarn in 2 different contrasting colors introducing the mosaic zigzag dishcloth crochet pattern a captivating design that will add a touch of elegance to your kitchen decor this intermediate-level pattern features a mesmerizing mosaic stitch that creates a stunning zigzag pattern the dishcloth is worked flat from the bottom up with detailed written instructions a video tutorial photo tutorial and a helpful chart to guide you through the process the pattern is available in one size with additional size details provided in the notes section get ready to elevate your crochet skills and create a functional yet stylish dishcloth with this unique pattern **unique features-** intricate crochet mosaic pattern detailed written instructions chart and video tutorial mesmerizing zigzag design suitable for adventurous beginner crocheters versatile dishcloth pattern **materials needed-** hook 5mm us size 8 0 yarn premier home cotton in 2 colors aran weight 100-300 yards the pattern is free on my website or you can purchase from etsy & ravelry
